body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah Magoffin
Govenor of Kentucky.

The undersigned, would Respy represent to your Excellency. that he sometime since purchased of a Merchant in Danville a Pistol. put it in his pocket unloaded and carried it home. and for this he was prosecuted for wearing or Carrying a concealed weapon, and was for an alledged violation of an ordinance of the Town of Danville, fined a few days ago by Speed S Fry county Judge the sum of Fifty dollars and costs
the pistol was not loaded and after purchasing it, put int h his pockett and carried it home
that is all the violation he was guilty of. he had never carried the pistol before or Since. thought it was necessary to have a pistol about his home
he respectfully Solicits and Petitions your Excellency to remit the fine and release him from the Judgement
Sworn to before me by William E Waters this 1 Novr 1860
M T Chrisnan Clk B C Court
we respectfully Petition, your Excellency to remit the fine against W E Waters and relsease him from the Judgement, prayed for in his Petition within

J. H. Webb.
